abstract: How far will Google, Microsoft, Yahoo or other Internet powerhouses go in their effort to dominate digital advertising, the fastest-growing part of the marketing business?
lead_paragraph: How far will Google, Microsoft, Yahoo or other Internet powerhouses go in their effort to dominate digital advertising, the fastest-growing part of the marketing business?

headline.main: In Hot Ad Deal Environment, Are Big Agencies the Next Target?

abstract: Time Inc. ditches Yahoo and Google for contextual text ads.
snippet: Time Inc. ditches Yahoo and Google for contextual text ads.
lead_paragraph: For the last few years, publishers have seen text ads on their Web sites as found money, as they struck deals with Google and later Yahoo to place ads that relate (more or less) to the topics of their pages. Now they are starting to see those ads, small as they are, as so important they want to sell them themselves.

headline.main: Said Time Inc., Who Needs Google?
